titleStmt.title: An appeal to the light, or, Richard Baxter's account of four accused passages of a sermon on Eph. I,3 published in hope either to procure the convincing instructions of the wise, or to humble and stop the erroneous resisters of the truth.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
